content: this free crochet pattern shows you how to crochet puff flower bookmark you can choose between two sizes of the flower head the smaller one is round while the top of the bigger one is pulled inside creating a dome shape the length is easily customizable and the project uses very little yarn it may not be suitable for absolute beginners as it uses techniques such as puffs standing stitches and working in the round **now available on crochetpedia ** https //crochetpedia com/puff-flower-bookmark-free-crochet-pattern/ -> video tutorials for small and large versions are now available on youtube and in the post linked above
